Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: TOM
Reviews.Content: Works so far. I had it for a couple months now. The 4 large camera can only be wall mounted. The 2 small indoor cams can be mounted on wall or ceiling. The motion activated range is 10 feet or less. Had it down to 18F temp and the outdoor cameras still work. You'll need to put electric tape around the outside connections and around any connections you don't use to prevent a short.
